credit_rates.note_pp: Part payment / Buy Now - Pay Later requires the signing of a credit agreement with a credit card after credit assessment with the following price example: Eff. interest rate 30.8 %. Kr 20 000 over 12 months cost kr 3 063. In total kr 23 063.

credit.title: Information from KreditZ
credit.description: To make it as easy as possible for you to document your income and expenses, Santander Consumer Bank has entered into a partnership with the company Kreditz Kreditz obtains information about your income and expenses easily and securely via your bank, and then we create a household budget for you to whom we commit ourselves. Once you have filled in your information at Kreditz, you will be sent back to this application.

political_exposed_person.label: Political exposed person
political_exposed_person.tooltip:
Choose yes if you or someone in your immediate family is a politically exposed person.
This includes:
- State head, Prime Minister / head of state, Minister, Deputy Minister / Deputy Minister
- Member of National Assembly
- Member of the Supreme Court
- Member of higher court statements who make decisions that can only be appealed exceptionally
- Member of the Board of Auditors, Court of Auditors
- Member of the central bank, Ambassador, Charge d`affaires
- Member of administrative, management or controlling body of a state-owned enterprise
- Higher ranking military officer
- Function in the management of an international organization

applied_on_behalf_of_others.label: Applied on behalf of others
